DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Dovrat et al 2018 JEcol - Plant biomass and nitrogen fixation data
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: The table contains the data for all four species of legumes and three experimental treatments. Data includes total plant biomass, root nodule biomass, root mass fraction (RMF; Root/Total biomass), and estimated rate of fixation for the entire plant (according to acetylene reduction rate).
